title: Konstantinos Tasoulas - Wikipedia
snippet: Konstantinos Tasoulas (Greek: Κωνσταντίνος Τασούλας [konstaˈdinos taˈsulas]; born 17 July 1959) is a Greek politician and lawyer who has served as the president of the Hellenic Republic since 13 March 2025. He previously served as President of the Hellenic Parliament from ...

title: Greece Elects New President Despite MPs' Walkout Over Train Crash | Balkan Insight
snippet: As the former parliamentary speaker, he is accused of participating in a government effort to cover up and delay investigations into the train crash. His inauguration will take place on March 13, when the term of the current President, Katerina ...

title: Konstantinos Tasoulas Sworn in as 9th President of Greece - tovima.com
snippet: The inauguration ceremony of Konstantinos Tasoulas as the 9th President of the Hellenic Republic was completed in a grand event held at the Greek Parliament on Thursday, March 13.

title: Konstantinos Tasoulas sworn in as Greece’s new president | eKathimerini.com
snippet: Former Parliament speaker Konstantinos Tasoulas became the ninth president of the Hellenic Republic since the fall of the 1967-1974 dictatorship and the abolition of the monarchy, on Thursday.

title: Konstantinos Tasoulas - Wikidata
snippet: Greek politician, President of Greece since 2025
